
## Data Summary {.tabset .tabset-fade}

### Data Sources

These are the primary data resources being used by the CEID Coronavirus Working Group

[Timeline of key events and case notifications by country](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SC28cM52m6s1gTJutpvFxadT9GGu-li90tsqkGuaM48/edit#gid=0) | Google sheet, updated daily, maintainer: [CEID](http://ceid.uga.edu)
[Case notifications in China by province](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gTj4zFMfXRk92CCQAOwa04ZBhqJ4oSmQFm_nb8-YXbw/edit) | Google sheet, updated daily, maintainer: [CEID](http://ceid.uga.edu)
[Case notifications in China by prefecture](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CEIDatUGA/ncov-data-summary/master/data/prefecture_master_binary.csv?token=AD7PNRIZ4HXYJ42PPYBIRTS6JL4QE) | csv, updated daily, maintainer: [CEID](http://ceid.uga.edu)
[Interventions in China by prefecture](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aK9Es7x6KReabBRkWiBbiSGsxSC37kPKD-qiPcD50hg/edit#gid=0) | Google sheet, updated daily, maintainer: [CEID](http://ceid.uga.edu)
[Travel advisories](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cYqkGOy4ZjHSIeRqyfyi7UvYnG6-UlBAJWD8GMFZA7I/edit#gid=1525027375) | Google sheet, updated daily, maintainer: [CEID](http://ceid.uga.edu)
